scripts.dev:all:worker: concurrently -k --kill-others-on-fail --success first -n worker,client -c magenta,blue "npm run dev:worker" "npm run dev:client:worker"
scripts.bootstrap: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); function findRepoRoot(start){let dir=path.resolve(start);for(;;){const pkg=path.join(dir,'package.json');const serverDir=path.join(dir,'Server');if(fs.existsSync(pkg)&&fs.existsSync(serverDir)&&fs.statSync(serverDir).isDirectory())return dir;const parent=path.dirname(dir);if(parent===dir)return start;dir=parent;}} const repoRoot=findRepoRoot(process.cwd()); const raw=process.env.C4_DB_PATH||'server/dev.db'; const dbPath=path.isAbsolute(raw)?raw:path.resolve(repoRoot,raw); console.log(JSON.stringify({repoRoot,raw,dbPath})); if(fs.existsSync(dbPath)&&fs.statSync(dbPath).isDirectory()){throw new Error('C4_DB_PATH is a directory: '+dbPath);} fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(dbPath),{recursive:true}); const Database=require('better-sqlite3'); const db=new Database(dbPath); db.pragma('journal_mode = WAL'); db.pragma('foreign_keys = ON'); db.exec('PRAGMA user_version = 1;'); db.close(); console.log('OK bootstrap sqlite '+dbPath);"
scripts.deploy:cf: npm run build && wrangler pages publish dist
